mapper.select: SELECT products.title, products.image, products.weight, products.selling_Price sellingPrice, orders.id orderId, orders.product_number productNumber, orders.agent_price agentPrice, orders.price productTotalPrice, orders.status orderStatus FROM orders LEFT JOIN products ON products.id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.order_number = #{orderNumber}

SELECT products.title, products.image, products.weight, orders.id orderId, orders.product_number productNumber, orders.agent_price productTotalPrice, IFNULL(agent_products.price,products.selling_price) price FROM user_order uo LEFT JOIN orders ON uo.order_number = orders.order_number AND orders.status = 0 LEFT JOIN products ON products.id = orders.product_id LEFT JOIN agent_products ON agent_products.product_id = orders.product_id AND agent_products.agent_user_id = #{requestMap.userAgentId} WHERE
uo.user_id in
${user}
AND
uo.status = 0 AND delivery_mode = 2
